1)Warmup:
//Begin Program//
q:= RandomPrime(160: Proof :=false);
q;
Ilog2(q);
repeat 
got_it,p := RandomPrime(1024,1,q,1000 : Proof :=false);
until got_it;
p;
Ilog2(p);
tmp := Random(p);
exp :=(p-1) div q;
g:= Modexp(tmp,exp,p);
g;
Modexp(g,q,p);
A_priv := Random(p-1);
A_pub :=Modexp(g,A_priv,p);
B_priv := Random(p-1);
B_pub :=Modexp(g,B_priv,p);
A_sec :=Modexp(B_pub,A_priv,p);
B_sec :=Modexp(A_pub,B_priv,p);
A_sec eq B_sec;
/*Secret is*/
A_sec;
//End Program//

//Begin Output//
1082608624460405930862715835898842103091298698577
159
1558174517610001160462433846199866765550284712081699863098384432477202205334237\
3912077735093507196251893076750108576524313532229663784549236744759746717364065\
4287844483723270246355596883184832202685407218534960618259147996420798381384077\
082121404463725853837795738228894437258993628778351037802630823552087389
1023
8306407138893805919051126266343517638753287124076144141860314637750128112711897\
6411262258666267643694143531971672663197842348179705716462525175990434022335747\
1836761632588717346635986304959876964926413866315729027476123558118206683660866\
94521851182654636279432961301951888969440926035156313163753593083812810
1
true
6143674364480730444181065980111261179067608539926081662023658892783675151250115\
6132553456633257782301867874677439293070602683414867513451075227680312732459105\
9031739701740118145605861008842587848836165261302005560089016589889437926054408\
59054522253569269160103499456530855753131129427025393125655528453934654
//End Output//


2)Hastadâ€™s Broadcast Attack:
//Begin Program//
N1 :=RSAModulus(152,3);
N1;
N2 :=RSAModulus(152,3);
N2;
N3 :=RSAModulus(152,3);
N3;
N1 lt N2;
N2 lt N3;
M :=Random(N3);
M;
C1:= Modexp(M,3,N1);
C2:= Modexp(M,3,N2);
C3:= Modexp(M,3,N3);
C1;
C2;
C3;
ciphertexts :=[C1,C2,C3];
moduli :=[N1,N2,N3];
Cprime :=CRT(ciphertexts,moduli);
Cprime;
Iroot (Cprime,3);
M eq Iroot (Cprime,3);
//End Program//

//Begin Output//
3798390187061154152795660197749849128663914027
3755045274345675290616836710883469824266550083
2882605460682802307856553547259018505807805377
false
false
241860400640445937484927835273734080719116970
2603479046442032364458869793832774712734576559
2553697734653289377022192135201419575611585753
1666642282426494419545862842668328314806698527
1414797565487506037438156532636497351089735061979364523710717189737121636707707\
5185300283630479505842905479386874664415359182605873000
241860400640445937484927835273734080719116970
true
//End Output//


3)Factorisation speed using Magma:
For 100 bit number--
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^100);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
1204045272237916685626772720949
[ <3, 3>, <7, 1>, <15427, 1>, <412951961238135943759283, 1> ]
Time: 0.010
//End Output//

For 150 bit number--
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^150);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
498101889306069579340216211457339820070817316
[ <2, 2>, <181, 1>, <759224207697091, 1>, <906169782230681665329531799, 1> ]
Time: 0.130
//End Output//

FOr 200 bit number--
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^200);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
316740222672092403444816672923420309825600466174993134591443
[ <53, 1>, <1115538217, 1>, <1575868933, 1>,
<3399560707538647405875393517830257667971, 1> ]
Time: 0.030
//End Output//

Exercise 3.(1).
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^144);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
13686237161968765406952041731563451432435450
[ <2, 1>, <5, 2>, <7, 1>, <39103534748482186877005833518752718378387, 1> ]
Time: 0.010
//End Output//

Exercise 3.(2).
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^172);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
4872744771095480258195836793165029145887369431695670
[ <2, 1>, <3, 1>, <5, 1>, <23, 1>, <41, 1>, <193, 1>,
<892449000836173139815024037341785604295878811, 1> ]
Time: 0.020
//End Output//

Exercise 3.(3).
//Begin Program//
n:= Random(2^202);
n;
time Factorisation(n);
//End Program//
//Begin Output//
4708245724961182293780049037408891725419351038756334583251883
[ <167997143, 1>, <28025748776937130971209724902338914926781528890383181, 1> ]
Time: 0.040
//End Output//
